title: Looking for friends
body:
I'm looking to make a few mates on League - guys or girls, I don't mind. I play on the Oceania server of League of Legends. My username is Chronosima. I don't play ranked yet and I'm only level 10, but I'm pretty good at playing PvP matches! 

- Chrono

replies.body: Hey I've added you, I've only just started on league myself, plus solo queuing is....Very...well you know... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I'll be your friend, I'm level 14 and play daily :P
Yeah sure. Send me a request if you haven't yet and I'll accept when I get home. We should definitely have a few games today.
